ru.guredd.jbfilemanager
Class HttpSessionTreePersistence

java.lang.Object
  ru.guredd.jbfilemanager.HttpSessionTreePersistence

public class HttpSessionTreePersistence
extends java.lang.Object

JBFileManager from Eduard Gurskiy, 2010 Class responsible for persistence of JBFM tree state via HTTP session.
